data.title: Mrs. Doubtfire – Chuck Jones
data.meta_description: Created for the 1993 Chuck Jones-directed animated short film, 'Mrs. Doubtfire' Medium: Original Production Hand-Painted, Hand-Inked Cel Size: 12F Price: $525, unframed Please contact your consultant for more details and availability. For International inquiries, please contact clientservices@chuckjones.com Reference: MD01-022-10
data.text:
The Official Chuck Jones Virtual Experience is pleased to offer ANIMATION fans a "Pudgie - Mrs. Doubtfire" Original Production work by Chuck Jones.

The Academy Award-winning animation director-artist, Chuck Jones (1912 - 2002) has created many memorable hit TV shows, movies, and short films. He is truly a legend and icon in the art world!

This rare, limited-edition artwork was created by animation director-artist, Chuck Jones from his vast Tower 12 Motion Picture Project portfolio of original and limited-edition works of art.

The inspiration for this original work of art came from the 1993 'Mrs. Doubtfire,' an animated short film directed by Chuck Jones featuring the character, Pudgy the Parrot.

The Original Production artwork is accompanied by a certificate of authenticity.
